columns.name: mpid
columns.description: Video identifer. Foreign key relation with videos.id.

columns.name: created
columns.description: Timestamp for when this event occurred.

columns.name: ip
columns.description: Originating IP address for this event.

columns.name: huid
columns.description: Harvard ID of the user who initiated this event, or 'anonymous'.

columns.name: session_id
columns.description: Tracking identifier for a per-user session.

columns.name: is_live
columns.description: True if the user is watching a live video, false if the video is recorded.

columns.name: inpoint
columns.description: Timestamp within the video when the event occurred.

columns.name: outpoint
columns.description: Timestamp within the video when the event occurred.

columns.name: is_playing
columns.description: True if the video is currently playing, false if not.

columns.name: useragent
columns.description: Content of the user-agent header from the HTTP request.

columns.name: course
columns.description: Title of the course in which the video is embedded.
